local_intent: Perceive the T block, align and set yaw, perform a diagonal push, then verify arrival at the target zone.
assumptions: Block becomes visible after scan if initially not seen
Target zone can be detected for verification
coherence_with_global: Implements the perceive -> align -> set yaw -> push (45 deg, 0.2) -> re-detect and verify sequence consistent with GLOBAL_BT and description.
